title: "Techniques for Healing Pain and Negative Emotions"
first_phrase: In the previous section, we learned about working with energy to bring it forward using different techniques. Now, let's discuss an exercise used by Professor Di Pisa to work with regression to heal negative emotions and pain. This exercise involves connecting with the subject's pain and creating an aura for protection. The subject visualizes the pain as being removed, and a light entering their body to heal it. The exercise finishes by bringing the subject back to their normal state of consciousness.
content: * On imagine maintenant de "aspirer " le sujet, de emporter son énergie en nous. * Quand la personne arrive à faire le vide mental, on passe la main, de l’haut vers le bas, (pas obligatoirement proche de la partie douloureuse, que la personne nous a indiqué mais, avec l’idée et la force énergétique de pousser, la douleur, hors du corps) (méthode de Mesmer pour enlever les énergies négatives). - S’il y a plusieurs parties douloureuses on commence par celle qui se trouve plus en haut. * On imagine qu’une lumière rentre dans le corps du sujet et que la douleur disparaisse * Enfin on souffle très fort sur le visage du sujet, pour qu’il rentre dans sont normal état de conscience.
last_phrase: In conclusion, these energy healing techniques can be helpful in managing pain and negative emotions. With practice and proper guidance, one can learn to harness their own energy and use it to alleviate discomfort. However, it is important to remember that these methods should not replace professional medical treatment and therapy.
